kpi.name: M8019C3

kpi_info.title: Inter System Handover attempts to GERAN with SRVCC per neighbor cell relationship
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of Inter System Handover attempts to GERAN with SRVCC (Single Radio Voice Call Continuity, 3GPP TS 23.216) per neighbor cell relationship. UPDATED: Reception of an S1AP:HANDOVER COMMAND message (source eNB <- MME; 3GPP TS 36.413) in case this message is received in response to the preparation of an Inter System Handover to GERAN with SRVCC (Single Radio Voice Call Continuity, 3GPP TS 23.216).

kpi.kpi_alias: Inter System Handover attempts to GERAN with SRVCC per neighbor cell relationship
